item.title: 思科发布强劲销售预测，人工智能渗透再现新迹象
item.description: 思科系统公司作为全球最大的计算机网络和互联网设备制造商，对当前季度给出了乐观预测，这表明该公司正吸引着人工智能系统建设客户的青睐。【原文：Cisco Systems Inc., the largest maker of machines that run computer networks and the internet, delivered an upbeat forecast for the current quarter, signaling that the company is attracting customers building artificial intelligence systems.】

item.title: 麦当劳业绩超预期，价值战略成效显著
item.description: 麦当劳公司第四季度美国销售额增速创逾两年新高，其超值套餐持续受到注重成本的食客青睐。【原文：McDonald’s Corp.’s US sales grew at the fastest pace in more than two years in the fourth quarter as value meals continued to resonate with cost-conscious diners.】

item.title: 房地产服务类股成为"人工智能恐慌交易"最新多米诺骨牌
item.description: 房地产服务类股周三下跌，投资者正评估这些公司面临新一轮人工智能应用和工具冲击的脆弱性，这些技术正威胁着颠覆多个行业。【原文：Real estate services stocks sank Wednesday as investors assessed the companies’ vulnerability to the newest crop of artificial intelligence applications and tools that threatens to disrupt several industries.】

item.title: 埃隆·马斯克在联合创始人离职后重组xAI部门架构
item.description: 埃隆·马斯克表示，在两位联合创始人本周早些时候离职后，他重组了自己的人工智能初创公司xAI。【原文：Elon Musk said he reorganized xAI, his artificial intelligence startup, following the exit of two of its co-founders earlier this week.】

item.title: 2026财年前三个月美国预算缺口缩减17%
item.description: 关税收入在财政年度前四个月帮助缩减了17%的美国预算赤字，这凸显了特朗普政府面临的关键问题之一——最高法院正在审议总统是否有权征收大部分关税。【原文：Tariff revenue helped shrink the US budget deficit by 17% in the first four months of the fiscal year, showcasing one of the stakes for the administration as the Supreme Court weighs whether President Donald Trump had the authority to impose most of his duties.】

item.title: 标准普尔或将哈雷戴维森评级下调至垃圾级
item.description: 标准普尔全球评级周三表示，哈雷戴维森公司公布业绩低于预期后，其信用评级可能被下调至垃圾级。【原文：Harley-Davidson Inc.’s credit ratings may get cut to junk status after the motorcycle maker posted weaker-than-expected results, S&P Global Ratings said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 特朗普政府警告秘鲁：中国港口正侵蚀其主权
item.description: 特朗普政府警告称，秘鲁正逐渐丧失对其首都附近一座中国港口的主权控制权。此前当地法官裁定该港口可免于部分监管审查。【原文：The Trump administration warned that Peru is losing sovereignty over a Chinese-owned port near its capital city, after a local judge ruled that the port is exempt from some regulatory oversight.】

item.title: 苹果最新推出的Siri新版本遭遇技术障碍
item.description: 苹果公司筹备已久的Siri虚拟助手升级计划，在近几周的测试中遭遇了障碍，可能导致多项备受期待的功能推迟发布。【原文：Apple Inc.’s long-planned upgrade to the Siri virtual assistant has run into snags during testing in recent weeks, potentially pushing back the release of several highly anticipated functions.】

item.title: 马克龙因"买欧洲货"政策与德国走向对峙
item.description: 法国总统埃马纽埃尔·马克龙在欧盟关键会议前夕重启其"欧洲制造"倡议，这使他与德国总理弗里德里希·梅尔茨在如何应对欧洲经济困境的问题上产生分歧。【原文：French President Emmanuel Macron returned to his “Made in Europe” push on the eve of a key European Union meeting, putting him at odds with German Chancellor Friedrich Merz over how best to tackle Europe’s economic woes.】

item.title: 原油过剩对美国炼油商实属福音，因燃料需求依然坚挺
item.description: 原油市场供应过剩，压低油价并挤压钻井商。但对美国炼油商而言，供过于求却意外带来丰厚收益。【原文：Oil markets are awash in crude, keeping a lid on prices and squeezing drillers. For US refiners, though, the glut is proving a windfall.】

item.title: 美国航空空乘人员将举行抗议活动，要求罢免首席执行官
item.description: 美国航空集团空乘人员表示，他们将于本周举行抗议活动，要求首席执行官罗伯特·艾索姆辞职。此前该航空公司因运营和财务表现不佳而陷入困境。【原文：American Airlines Group Inc. flight attendants said they will hold a protest this week demanding that Chief Executive Officer Robert Isom step down as the carrier grapples with operational and financial underperformance.】

item.title: 摩根大通晋升通信银行家科普担任全球最高职位
item.description: 摩根大通公司任命伯克哈德·科普为全球通信投资银行业务主管，因涉及数字基础设施的交易持续推动交易量增长。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. has named Burkhard Koep as global head of communications investment banking, as transactions involving digital infrastructure continue to drive deal volume.】

item.title: 法国央行预计2026年初经济将持续增长
item.description: 法国央行表示，尽管地缘政治风险和不确定性持续存在，但法国经济将在年初保持稳定增长。【原文：France’s economy will sustain steady growth at the start of the year, unchecked by persistent geopolitical risks and uncertainty, the central bank said.】

item.title: 默茨称欧盟应考虑调整碳市场机制
item.description: 德国总理弗里德里希·梅尔茨表示，如果欧盟碳市场无法推动工业向清洁生产转型，欧盟就应考虑修改或推迟该市场计划。【原文：German Chancellor Friedrich Merz said the European Union should be open to revising or postponing its carbon market if it doesn’t enable the industry shift to clean production.】

item.title: 比尔·阿克曼的珀欣广场披露对Meta的新持股
item.description: 比尔·阿克曼的珀欣广场基金表示，已持有Meta Platforms Inc.的大量股份。【原文：Bill Ackman’s Pershing Square said it has taken a sizable stake in Meta Platforms Inc.】

item.title: 加拿大央行将"不确定性卷土重来"归咎于美国政策
item.description: 加拿大银行理事会表示，美国近期在贸易、外交政策及央行独立性方面的举措正使世界局势"更加动荡"，并加剧了不确定性。【原文：The Bank of Canada’s governing council says recent US actions on trade, foreign policy and central bank independence are making the world “more turbulent” and escalating uncertainty.】

item.title: 电力服务公司Solv在5.13亿美元IPO后首日大涨20%
item.description: Solv Energy Inc.股价开盘较其首次公开募股价格上涨20%，此前这家能源基础设施服务公司通过在美国首次公开募股筹集了5.125亿美元。【原文：Solv Energy Inc. shares opened 20% above their IPO price, after the energy infrastructure services company raised $512.5 million in a US initial public offering.】

item.title: 美联储将取消对银行的部分先前要求以修复缺陷
item.description: 美联储已向贷款机构发出信号，表示计划放弃此前为改善运营而向其发送的部分保密警告。与此同时，美联储副主席米歇尔·鲍曼正持续放宽央行对美国金融机构的监管力度。【原文：The Federal Reserve has signaled to lenders it plans to abandon some of the confidential warnings it previously sent them to improve operations as Vice Chair Michelle Bowman continues to relax the central bank’s oversight of US financial firms.】

item.title: 德国保守派要求政府在天然气储存领域发挥更大作用
item.description: 德国保守派正推动政府在保障天然气储备方面发挥更强有力的作用，以避免供气中断。随着欧洲各地储气水平处于极低状态，这一动向表明该问题正日益具有政治敏感性。【原文：Germany’s conservatives are pushing for the state to take a stronger role in securing gas reserves to avoid shutdowns, a sign that the issue is becoming more politically charged as filling levels across Europe are critically low.】

item.title: 法国巴黎银行与Mistral AI续签三年合作协议
item.description: 法国巴黎银行正深化与Mistral AI的合作关系，将合作期限延长三年。【原文：BNP Paribas SA is deepening its partnership with Mistral AI, extending it for a three year period.】

item.title: 曼达尼的杂货店计划推进之际，纽约市重启经济政策
item.description: 佐兰·马姆达尼市长领导的政府已着手在纽约市五个行政区物色选址，筹建市政府支持的杂货店，以此推进一项标志性竞选承诺——该承诺在去年选举期间曾引发广泛质疑。【原文：Mayor Zohran Mamdani’s administration has begun scouting sites for city-backed grocery stores in each of New York City’s five boroughs, pushing ahead on a signature campaign promise that drew widespread skepticism during last year’s electoral race.】

item.title: 墨西哥比索涨势受阻，特朗普重燃贸易忧虑
item.description: 推动墨西哥比索升至近两年高位的涨势周三遭遇挫折，因有消息称美国总统特朗普正考虑退出北美贸易协定。【原文：The rally that has sent the Mexican peso to the highest in almost two years hit a bump on Wednesday as US President Donald Trump was said to be musing an exit from the North American trade pact.】

item.title: 2025年美国高校从外国获得52亿美元收入
item.description: 2025年，美国高校从外国来源获得的捐赠和合同金额超过52亿美元，其中超过半数资金流向了四所高校：卡内基梅隆大学、麻省理工学院、斯坦福大学和哈佛大学。【原文：US colleges received more than $5.2 billion in gifts and contracts from foreign sources in 2025, with more than half of those dollars going to just four schools: Carnegie Mellon University, Massachusetts Institute of Technology, Stanford University and Harvard University.】

item.title: Meta将在印第安纳州投资逾100亿美元建设数据中心
item.description: Meta Platforms公司宣布将斥资逾100亿美元在印第安纳州黎巴嫩市建设数据中心园区，此举使其成为该公司迄今为止最大的人工智能基础设施投资项目之一。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. said it will spend more than $10 billion to build a data center campus in Lebanon, Indiana, ranking it among the company’s largest artificial intelligence infrastructure investments to date.】

item.title: 斯洛伐克基准20年期国债创纪录吸引86亿欧元认购需求
item.description: 斯洛伐克发行20亿欧元（约合24亿美元）基准债券时获得创纪录的认购需求，其今年首笔银团贷款交易吸引了更多投资者参与。【原文：Slovakia attracted record demand for the sale of a €2 billion ($2.4 billion) benchmark bond, widening the pool of investors in its first syndicated transaction of the year.】

item.title: 托马斯·布拉沃在持续的SaaS末日危机中寻求软件收购良机
item.description: 据托马斯·布拉沃公司一位顶级交易员称，当前软件行业持续抛售之际，公开市场未能充分辨别价值，这家私募股权公司已准备好利用恐慌情绪大举收购。【原文：Public markets are not being discerning enough in the ongoing software selloff, according to one of Thoma Bravo’s top dealmakers, and the private equity firm is ready to take advantage of the panic.】

item.title: 黑石集团以紧缩的CLO定价抵御私人信贷担忧
item.description: 黑石集团以今年最紧缩的利率之一售出近10亿美元的私募信贷贷款组合，尽管市场普遍担忧直接贷款行业前景，但此举表明投资者需求依然强劲。【原文：Blackstone Inc. sold a nearly $1 billion bundle of private credit loans at one of the tightest levels this year, signaling strong investor demand despite broader concerns about the direct lending industry.】
